title: Keith's story
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: A woman's tribute to the greatest man she knows - her husband
description: Although now struggling with Alzheimer's disease, the stories of Keith's achievements and adventures as told by his wife are a tribute to his inspirational life. Created as part of 'Memory's Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage' in association with Vic Health and the Alzheimer's Association.
